Is the input integer(ish)?

Source: R/check-vector-isIntegerish.R
check-vector-isIntegerish.Rd

Check for valid input of either explicit (e.g. 1L) and/or implict (e.g. 1) integer.

isIntegerish(x, .xname = getNameInParent(x))

isInt(x, nullOK = FALSE)

Arguments

x

Object.
.xname

Name of object defined in x. Not intended to be used directly.
nullOK

logical(1). If set to TRUE, x may also be NULL.

Value

TRUE on success; FALSE on failure, with cause set.

Functions

  • isIntegerish: Vectorized.

  • isInt: Scalar.

Note

Updated 2019-10-09.

See also

  • isInt() or isScalarIntegerish() for scalar.

  • rlang::is_integerish().

  • checkmate::checkIntegerish().

Examples

## TRUE ====
isIntegerish(seq_len(2L))
#>    1    2 
#> TRUE TRUE 
isIntegerish(c(1, 2))
#> 1.000000000000000e+00 2.000000000000000e+00 
#>                  TRUE                  TRUE 

## FALSE ====
isIntegerish(0.1)
#> [1] FALSE
#> Cause: 1 failure
#>   pos                 value       cause
#> 1   1 1.000000000000000e-01 not integer
